data.name: Istanbul Ship Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Istanbul Ship Simulator is a simple and fun ship simulation game located in the city of Istanbul. You can play all more than 20 challenging mission or choose any ship you like and sail at the coasts of Istanbul.

There are two game modes in the game. First one is Missions and the othe one is Free Roam.
- In Free Roam Mode,you can choose one of seven different ship and sail freely.
- In Missions section, you can play more than twenty mission.
data.about_the_game:
Istanbul Ship Simulator is a simple and fun ship simulation game located in the city of Istanbul. You can play all more than 20 challenging mission or choose any ship you like and sail at the coasts of Istanbul.

There are two game modes in the game. First one is Missions and the othe one is Free Roam.
- In Free Roam Mode,you can choose one of seven different ship and sail freely.
- In Missions section, you can play more than twenty mission.
data.short_description: Istanbul Ship Simulator is a simple and fun ship simulation game located in the city of Istanbul. You can play all 22 challenging mission or choose any ship you like and sail at the coasts of Istanbul.
data.supported_languages:
English, French, German, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 8th Gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 600
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard with Numpad
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 10th Gen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard with Numpad
